News.headline: Match Preview: Barrow AFC v Dagenham and Redbridge
News.page_title: Match Preview: Barrow AFC v Dagenham and Redbridge
News.URL_keywords: Match Preview: Barrow AFC v Dagenham and Redbridge
News.short_description: A preview of the Daggers Vanarama National League away match against Barrow AFC tomorrow
News.description:
The Daggers make the long trip to Barrow tomorrow and will be looking to build on their late win against promotion rivals Forest Green Rovers at home last Saturday.

Barrow currently sit in eighth place in the Vanarama National League and are four points off the playoffs. The Bluebirds will be looking to bounce back from their 2-0 away defeat to Eastleigh last Saturday.

Previous 5 Results

Daggers
Daggers 2-1 Forest Green
Gateshead 1-0 Daggers
Daggers 1-2 Maidstone
Daggers 2-1 Bromley
Daggers 1-2 Guiseley
  
Barrow
Eastleigh 2-0 Barrow
Barrow 2-1 Tranmere
Barrow 0-0 Sutton
Guiseley 1-0 Barrow
Tranmere 5-1 Barrow (FA Trophy)

Team News
Matt Robinson and Curtley Williams will be looking at returning to the squad following their injuries. Elliot Romain will also be looking at joining the squad following his signing during the week. Luke Howell and Luke Guttridge are both to set to miss out.
  
Previous Meetings
It was an afternoon to forget for the Daggers the last time these two teams met. Barrow beat the Daggers 4-1 at the Chigwell Construction Stadium back in November.

Fixtures
With four teams of the National League being involved in the FA Trophy this weekend there are nine matches in total in the Vanarama National League this weekend. 3PM KO (Unless stated)

Aldershot V Sutton
Barrow V Daggers
Boreham Wood V Guiseley
Braintree V Southport
Chester V Eastleigh
Dover V Bromley
Forest Green V Wrexham
Gateshead v Woking
North Ferriby v Solihull

Tickets
Ticket information for the game can be found here.

Social Media:
Follow the Daggers on Twitter for live updates throughout the match (@Dag_RedFC). There will also be updates on our Facebook page (OfficialDaggers). After the match there will be a match report on the website.
